thread.title: New Report Adds to Speculation About Melania Trump’s Move To DC
thread.title_full: New Report Adds to Speculation About Melania Trump’s Move To DC

author: Jack Davis
title: New Report Adds to Speculation About Melania Trump’s Move To DC
text:
Watchdog Group Sues To Get Facts About ‘Tarmac Meeting’ Between Lynch And Clinton [Video] 
Since that time, Melania Trump has joined her husband in Washington for several major events, including his speech to a joint session of Congress. She has also hosted the Governors Ball, and a luncheon in honor of International Women’s Day. She will be hosting the annual White House Easter Egg Roll and has made appearances at children’s hospitals in New York City and Washington. 
During last week’s luncheon, she delivered a few remarks to the assembled guests. “As an immigrant myself, having grown up in a communist society, I know all too well the value and importance of freedom and equal opportunity — ideals which this great nation was founded and has continued to strive towards throughout its history,” she said. “There remains far more brutal and terrifying incarnations of actual gender persecution which we must face together, such as forced enslavement, sexual abuse and absolute repression of far too many women and girls around the globe. We must remember these women in our daily prayers and use our combined resources to help free them from such unthinkable and inhumane circumstances,” she added. 
As she has assumed a more public role, her popularity has risen. A CNN/ORC poll conducted earlier this month showed that 52 percent of those polled had a favorable opinion of her, up from 36 percent prior to her husband’s inauguration. What do you think?
